bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of gynecological and also internal diseases affecting women. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 38: 婦人病之有異於丈夫者，或因產後臟虛受寒，或因經水往來， 取冷過度，非獨關飲食失節，多挾有血氣所成也 , “ Women’s diseases differ from those of males because having given birth their depleted depots may receive cold, or in the course of periodic menstruation they may be excessively affected by cold. [Their diseases] are not related to immoderate eating and drinking; they often emerge because of [their personal] blood and qi [conditions]”.
